StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetWaiverLevels]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@WaiverTypeId int, @WaiverCategoryID int AS
SELECT DISTINCT WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID, WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE + ' - ' + WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC AS WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC, WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE FROM WAIVER_LEVEL WL, WAIVER W WHERE W.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = @WaiverTypeId AND W.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = @WaiverCategoryID AND W.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID AND WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE <> '0' ORDER BY WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC
